contentBlocks.title: General Spa Pump Timer Requirements
paragraphs: Spa pump timers must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Spa pump timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa pump timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa pump timers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Spa pump timers must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Spa pump timers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa pump timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa pump timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Spa pump timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa pump timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa pump timers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa pump timers must be installed by a qualified person.
